scripts.anvil: anvil --mnemonic "question federal analyst minimum outdoor clarify canoe cream relax poet thing embrace"
scripts.test:deploy:token: source ../../.env.staging && OWNER=0x795050DeCc0322567C4f0098209d4eDC5a69b9D0 NAME=Ftest SYMBOL=FTEST forge script script/DeployToken.s.sol:DeployToken --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --private-key $DEPLOYER_PK --verify -vvvvv --broadcast
scripts.dev:deploy:token: source ../../.env && OWNER=0x795050decc0322567c4f0098209d4edc5a69b9d0 NAME=Ftest SYMBOL=FTEST forge script script/DeployToken.s.sol:DeployToken --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key $DEPLOYER_PK -vvvvv --broadcast
scripts.staging:deploy:token: source ../../.env.staging && NAME=Ftest SYMBOL=FTEST BASESCAN_API_KEY=3JYZ4DQKMQ5W4NJ89IBQI45UWDKYK3IM2B forge script script/DeployToken.s.sol:DeployToken --rpc-url $BASE_RPC_URL --private-key $DEPLOYER_PK --verify -vvvvv --broadcast
scripts.foundry: curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash && source /vercel/.bashrc && foundryup && forge install
